parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port number on which the listening socket shall be created. This port should be available and usually above 1024.

parameter.name: authorizedHosts
parameter.description: Defines a list of allowed hosts. Only clients in that list will be accepted by the application. IPs and hostnames are allowed.

parameter.name: ID
parameter.description: Defines the moduleID to intercept messages from. The user must configure this parameter accordingly to the moduleID of the client.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Defines the typeID to intercept messages from. The user must configure this parameter accordingly to the typeID of the client.

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: Defines the regionTag that should be used in the origin's comment.

parameter.name: XMLArchive
parameter.description: Enables/disables XML messages storage in sub folder "archive" in the "defaulPath".

parameter.name: databaseStorage
parameter.description: Enables/disables generated Origin objects storage in database. The latters are actually sent to the messaging system whom deals with the creation of/association to a proper event and handles the database part.

parameter.name: eventDeletion
parameter.description: Enables/disables the possibility to delete events.

parameter.name: defaultPath
parameter.description: Defines the folder in which operations will be performed. If XMLArchive parameter is set to "true", this folder will also be used to store messages in sub-folder "archive".

parameter.name: eventDeletionMethod
parameter.description: Defines the method that should be used in order to remove an event from the database. The user may choose between "hide" or "delete".
